text: "'Mrs Dursley had had a nice, normal day. "'She told him over dinner all about Mrs Nextdoor's problems with her daughter "'and how Dudley had learnt a new word. "'Shamt!'

segments.text: "'Mrs Dursley had had a nice, normal day.
"'She told him over dinner all about Mrs Nextdoor's problems with her daughter
"'and how Dudley had learnt a new word.
